name: Pooltris Matching Game
description:
Welcome to this awesome color lines game on a pool table named “Pooltris”.

Features
- Endless fun on the iPad, iPod and iPhone
- Local and 24hrs online scoreboards
- Detailed instructions
- Nice high-resolution graphics
- Keeps you thinking!

The game starts with a spacious board with five balls chosen out of seven different colors. The player can move one ball per turn, and the player may only move a ball to a particular place if there is a path between the current position of the ball and the desired destination. After your turn, three more balls are dropped onto the field. Thus, every next move is going to be more and more difficult! The goal is to remove balls by forming lines (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) of at least five balls of the same color. If the result of a move has made a line disappear, the next portion of balls will not appear immediately. The goal is to reach the maximum score. Points are given every time you manage to remove some balls from the field.
With this educational game you can improve concentration, logical thinking and pattern matching skills.
